title: Why is Kayle so much rarer than other 5costs?
body:
Seriously, why?
I always feel like an idiot when I go Noble or Knight, because when late game comes around, im sitting there with my Rank1 Kayle(If im lucky).
Meanwhile my competition has 2, 2star Swains. 2 2star Dravens, or a 3star Asol.

replies.body:
Well, she's rarer than Draven and A.Sol because they're both 4-cost champions.

But she's not actually any rarer than other 5-costs. You just remember times when you can't get her more, because she fills in the super-powerful Noble 6, and all of the others are either stronger before 6, don't *require* 6, or have Spatula items. Kayle's the only one that becomes the key last pick of a specific comp with no alternatives, so not having a Kayle feels worse than not having one of the other 5-star choices.
Kayle's only rare if you have 5 noble count lol
Kayle is a good pick all around for a lot of comps to fill in the last spot. Just check the board if more then 1 person has even a 1 star Kayle I would say start trying to transfer your comp.

Just got 1st with 6 nobles, 2 guardians,3 blademasters.

Almost gold 1!

I believe only 8 (i forgot the exact number), 5 cost units are active in the shared pool at a given time, given that there are 6 of them, there is a decent chance that the one you need simply isn't in the pool at that moment. But the odds of rolilng anivia, yasuo karthus mf kayle swain is all the same
